SUGGESTION1 combined put IV extreme with low realized HV to find overpriced protection. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: IV call drop with HV rise (risk-on detection)
results.description: Signal = and(less(implied_volatility_call_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_call_30,10)), greater(ts_delta(historical_volatility_30,5), 0)). SUGGESTION1 combined unexpected IV drop with HV uptick. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.62.

Signal = scale(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_60, implied_volatility_mean_30), scale=1). SUGGESTION1 used scale to normalize tenor slope. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: IV spike relative to moving max
results.description: Signal = greater(implied_volatility_call_30, ts_max_diff(implied_volatility_call_30, 60)). SUGGESTION1 used max-diff to detect spikes. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Put-call skew normalized by recent stddev
results.description: Signal = divide(subtract(implied_volatility_put_30, implied_volatility_call_30), ts_std_dev(subtract(implied_volatility_put_30, implied_volatility_call_30), 20)). SUGGESTION1 normalized skew by recent volatility. SUGGESTION4 used widely available fields. KEEP_IN_MINDs within operator cap. Confidence 0.66.

Signal = hump(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_60, 7), hump=0.02). SUGGESTION1 used hump to reduce turnover while monitoring trend flattening. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.51.

Signal = greater(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_120), ts_std_dev(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_120), 60)). SUGGESTION1 used standardized gap. SUGGESTION4 used commonly available fields. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Realized HV vs its lag (mean reversion)
results.description: Signal = reverse(subtract(historical_volatility_30, ts_mean(historical_volatility_30, 20))). SUGGESTION1 used realized HV mean reversion. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: IV short-term anomaly flagged by quantile
results.description: Signal = if_else(greater(quantile(implied_volatility_mean_10), 0.85), subtract(implied_volatility_mean_10, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_10, 10)), NaN). SUGGESTION1 used conditional on extreme quantile to act only for extremes. SUGGESTION4 used well-covered field. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: IV long momentum filtered by ts_ir
results.description: Signal = if_else(greater(ts_ir(implied_volatility_mean_120, 60), 0.2), ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_120, 30), NaN). SUGGESTION1 used IR as a stability filter. SUGGESTION4 used long-term field with high counts. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Put IV clustering vs historical HV
results.description: Signal = subtract(ts_std_dev(implied_volatility_put_30, 10), ts_std_dev(historical_volatility_30, 10)). SUGGESTION1 compared clustering of IV and realized HV. SUGGESTION4 used fields with good counts. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.57.
Signal = reverse(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_10, implied_volatility_mean_60)). SUGGESTION1 used tenor reversal idea. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.60.

Signal = and(greater(parkinson_volatility_30, ts_mean(parkinson_volatility_30,60)), greater(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_30,60))). SUGGESTION1 combined both metrics to select true high-volatility names. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.65.

Signal = subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_quantile(implied_volatility_mean_30, 90)). SUGGESTION1 used ts_quantile to compare current to time-distribution. SUGGESTION4 chosen field with good coverage. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence 0.55.

Signal = zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_60)). SUGGESTION1 normalized tenor slope to reduce cross-sectional bias. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.59.
